thread.title: J.P. Morgan Near Deal to Sell Majority of Highbridge Private Equity Business
thread.title_full: J.P. Morgan Near Deal to Sell Majority of Highbridge Private Equity Business - WSJ

author: Juliet Chung
title: J.P. Morgan Near Deal to Sell Majority of Highbridge Private Equity Business
text:
J.P. Morgan Chase & Co. is close to relinquishing control of a $22 billion private-equity business, the latest move by a large U.S. bank to become simpler.
The New York lender is working to finalize a deal to sell the majority of Highbridge Capital Management LLCâ€™s private equity business to Highbridge Chief Executive Scott Kapnick and other members of his management team, according to people familiar with the matter.
